pkg:use: sh -c 'VENDOR_REPO=$1 && REPO_URL=https://github.com/$VENDOR_REPO.git && DIR=pkg/$VENDOR_REPO && [ -d $DIR ] && rm -rf $DIR || true && git subtree add --prefix=$DIR $REPO_URL main --squash || git subtree pull --prefix=$DIR $REPO_URL main --squash && composer require $VENDOR_REPO' - || git stash pop

scripts-descriptions.pkg:use: Install a package from a pkg repostiory. For example: `composer pkg:use confetti-cms/bool`
